statements: SELECT * FROM system_activity_log WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT action_taken, timestamp FROM system_activity_log WHERE log_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM system_activity_log WHERE action_taken LIKE 'Logout%';
SELECT log_id, action_taken FROM system_activity_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM system_activity_log GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM system_activity_log WHERE log_id = 10;
SELECT user_id, action_taken FROM system_activity_log WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM system_activity_log ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM system_activity_log WHERE action_taken LIKE '%login%' AND user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT log_id, user_id, timestamp FROM system_activity_log WHERE action_taken = 'logout' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM system_activities;
SELECT id, activity_type, timestamp FROM system_activities WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT activity_type FROM system_activities WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT id, user_id, activity_description FROM system_activities ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_actions WHERE action_type = 'login';
SELECT * FROM user_actions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, action_type FROM user_actions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND action_type LIKE '%login%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM system_activities GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_activities > 10 ORDER BY total_activities DESC;
SELECT id, action_type, timestamp FROM user_actions WHERE action_type IN ('update', 'delete') ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT activity_type, timestamp FROM system_activities WHERE DATE(timestamp) = '2022-06-30' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM system_activities ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT activity_name, activity_description FROM system_activities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, action_type, timestamp FROM user_actions WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT activity_name, timestamp FROM system_activities WHERE timestamp <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, article_id, interaction_type FROM knowledge_base_usage WHERE user_id = 50 AND article_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM system_activities;
SELECT activity_name, activity_description FROM system_activities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, action_type FROM user_actions WHERE action_type = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_base_usage WHERE user_id = 100 AND interaction_type = 'read' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, activity_name, activity_description, timestamp FROM system_activities WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM SystemActivityLog ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT action_type, user_id FROM UserActionLog WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT id, description FROM ActivityDetails WHERE id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT user_id, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM UserFeedback GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM SystemActivityLog WHERE action_type = 'Login' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM SystemActivityLog ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, action_type, timestamp FROM UserActionLog WHERE user_id = 123 AND action_type = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT ua.id, ua.action_type, ad.description FROM UserActionLog ua JOIN ActivityDetails ad ON ua.id = ad.activity_id WHERE ua.user_id = 456 AND ad.id = 789;
SELECT u.id, u.feedback, uf.timestamp FROM UserFeedback uf JOIN UserActionLog ual ON uf.user_id = ual.user_id WHERE ual.action_type = 'update' ORDER BY uf.timestamp DESC;

SELECT ua.id, ua.action_type, ad.description, uf.feedback FROM UserActionLog ua JOIN ActivityDetails ad ON ua.id = ad.activity_id JOIN UserFeedback uf ON ua.user_id = uf.user_id WHERE ua.user_id = 789 AND uf.id > 1000;
SELECT * FROM user_actions;
SELECT action_type, action_description FROM user_actions WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT article_title, article_content FROM knowledge_base ORDER BY last_modified_timestamp DESC;
SELECT activity_type, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM user_activities GROUP BY activity_type;
SELECT pattern_id, user_id, pattern_type FROM usage_patterns WHERE pattern_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY pattern_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM system_activities WHERE activity_type = 'log-in';
SELECT user_id, action_type, action_timestamp FROM user_actions WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT article_title, article_content FROM knowledge_base WHERE creation_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND last_modified_timestamp < '2022-06-01';
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activities ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, pattern_type FROM usage_patterns WHERE pattern_timestamp < '2022-07-01' ORDER BY user_id ASC, pattern_timestamp DESC;
